thread.title: "The Guest": Movie starring Rita Dominic, Femi Jacobs hits cinemas
thread.title_full: "The Guest": Movie starring Rita Dominic, Femi Jacobs hits cinemas

author: Gbenga Bada
title: "The Guest": Movie starring Rita Dominic, Femi Jacobs hits cinemas
text:
Tweet On Friday, February 3, 2017, Christian Olayinka 's thriller titled "The Guest" made its entry to the cinemas nationwide. Starring "The Meeting" co-stars, Rita Dominic and Femi Jacobs alongside Somkele Idahlamah ("The Arbitration") and Chika Chukwu ("Being Mrs Elliott"), the thriller made its debut after a screening in Lagos. 
Somkele Idahlamah and Femi Jacobs on the set of The Guest (The Guest) Though shot in Lagos in 2014, the movie tells the story of a couple who takes in a friend into their house and things turned out differently with the husband having an affair with the guest. ALSO READ : "The Guest" gets a release date Playing the role of a psychotic guest, Rita Dominic once again displayed her onset chemistry with Femi Jacobs. Speaking on her performance, Rita hinted that it was a welcomed role as she had not played a psychotic character before. 
Behind the scenes pictures of The Guest (The Guest) The actress further said playing such role opposite Femi Jacobs sees her naturally giving it all her best. "The Guest" is directed by Christian Olayinka and produced by Foluke Olaniyi. Tweet Author
